definition: Guangling district of Yangzhou city 揚州市|扬州市[Yang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
surname Guang
wide/numerous/to spread
mound/tomb/hill/mountain
Guangling district of Yangzhou city 揚州市|扬州市[Yang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu

sentences.english: Yes, this is the tomb of West Han Dynasty's Guangling State Emperor.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，這裏是西漢廣陵國王的陵墓。

sentences.english: So, the Guangling emperor had this jade robe made.
sentences.chinese: 所以廣陵王就製作了這樣一件金縷玉衣。

sentences.english: So, he was the first emperor of Guangling.
sentences.chinese: 原來他是當時廣陵國的第一代國王。

sentences.english: Particularly interesting BE, the Yang state once called wide Ling aforetime.
sentences.chinese: 格外有趣的是，揚州舊時曾叫廣陵。

sentences.english: Who was the emperor of Quangling?
sentences.chinese: 這廣陵國的國王到底是誰啊？

sentences.english: Han Jia, this must be an artifact from the tomb too.
sentences.chinese: 韓佳，這也是廣陵王墓出土的文物吧。

sentences.english: Early Han Dynasty, called for Guangling County Yangzhou.
You mean this is an imperial tomb?
sentences.chinese: 啊，這裏還是廣陵王的陵墓？
